hackathon-description-text: How can we design, program, and deploy a better tomorrow for everyone? Hack for Humanity, Santa Clara University's social good hackathon, poses this question to you. Will you answer?
hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=500 El Camino Real, Santa Clara, CA 95053, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: How novel is the app? What is the “wow” factor, technologically?
How novel is the idea or design?
How much good could this bring to others?
How clearly did the group/individual present its ideas and what makes their project special?

hackathon-location-address: 500 El Camino Real, Santa Clara, CA 95053, USA
hackathon-description-header: Join us in our fifth year of solving pressing social issues using your creativity and code
